http.title: Home - Staffordshire County Council
http.html:
We use cookies on this site We and our partners use cookies and collect information from your browser. This lets us deliver content and relevant adverts to you. It also helps us to understand our audience better. See our privacy policy to learn more about how we manage your data and your rights. See our cookies policy to see how we use cookies and tracking technology. To agree to our use of cookies, click the 'Accept' button.

LibrariesFrom books to local history resources, Your Library has a host of fabulous services and exciting events for you. Education & ChildrenWe aim to provide education and learning opportunities in Staffordshire for young and old people alike. Roads & TransportMaintaining the network of highways throughout Staffordshire, ensuring all forms of transport work together. Community & LivingCommunities are the heart of our county and we want to make sure they are safe prosperous places to live and work. EnvironmentWe're responsible for a wide range of environmental issues that affect your quality of life. BusinessWhether you are starting up or working to grow your business we offer a range of support. Your CouncilOur aim is to deliver high quality services and value for money, tailored to our customers and communities. Social Care & HealthWe aim to improve the lives of adults and children through a range of services, ensuring people get help at the right time.

Balanced budget set for 2019/20 Council overcomes £35m shortfall after taking early action to tackle problem.
